description:
'''Noise rock''' is a [[subgenre]] of [[rock music]] that originally emerged in the late 1970s and early 1980s. Artists fuse rock music to [[Noise music|noise]], while utilizing extreme levels of [[Distortion (music)|guitar distortion]] and [[Guitar feedback"|feedback]], primarily through the use of [[electric guitar]]s. 

Notable acts include [[Sonic Youth]], [[Big Black]], [[Swans (band)|Swans]], [[Flipper (band)|Flipper]], [[Cows (band)|Cows]], [[Scratch Acid]], [[No Trend]] and [[the Jesus Lizard]].
